@@ -0,0 +1,40 @@

+
+/*
+ * @test
+ * @bug 8357472
+ * @summary NPE in Types.containsType for type variable used as a qualifier
+ * @compile T8357472.java
+ */
+
+class T8357472 {
+    class A<T> {
+        protected class B<V> {}
+
+        public static <T, M extends A<T>> void f(Object g) {
+            @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
+            M.B<?> mapping = (M.B<?>) g;
+        }
+    }
+}
